Last item received from my Christmas order. When it finally arrived it looked to have been used/returned. Stuffed into the plastic package not even folded on the visible original fold lines. Buttons undone where they had been previously buttoned - again you can clearly see that the shirt had originally been buttoned - now unbuttoned and crammed into the packaging. Not impressed. Note, if I’m receiving a returned/used item, I don’t want to pay the full price. AND I want to decide for myself when purchasing a used item - I’m expecting a respectful transaction- in other words, if it’s used, it needs to be CLEARLY communicated- let me decide if I want to purchase an “as is” item. Rude.
